system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in.

description.value:
The Sharpshooter seeks absolute precision, to put a hole through a Gretchin at 500 metres is trivial, to pierce the weakpoint of an enemy walker is expected, and to do this quickly, precisely, and consistantly is their bread and butter.

Effects: Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Sharpshooter. Apt: Agility, Ballistic Skill, Fellowship, Finesse, Offence, Perception Add. Equipment: Good Triplex Lasgun or Good Long-Las or Good Missile Launcher+4 Krak Missiles. Gain Talents: Heightened Senses(Sight)+Deadeye Shot or Lasgun Volley. Can Purchase Unique Talent: Spotter and Basic Order: Pinpoint Guidance
